readable.title: 2541901399_0a57f4cc76
readable.content: A little boy walks with a woman wearing red in a wheelchair . a toddler in a green and yellow jersey is being followed by a wheelchair bound woman in a red sweater past a wooden bench . A woman in a wheelchair and a toddler at a park . A woman in a wheelchair and orange sweater follows a young boy in a park . A woman in a wheelchair follows a young boy at a park .
